column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////When I woke up this morning
column2: and this has happened more than once
column3: I had a hankering for Wildberry Cafe. I wish I lived closer to Chicago
column4: but if I ate there every day
column5: I'd have to admit to myself that I have less will power than I thought. In my recent visit to Chicago
column6: I frequented this restaurant twice. Considering there were several places I wanted to try and I went back
column7: showed me that I had it bad.
